summary.research_focus: Symbolic and Statistical Methods for Reasoning and Processing Formal Expressions
summary.event: School on Symbolic and Statistical Methods for Reasoning and Processing Formal Expressions
summary.description: The School aims to equip participants with advanced techniques for formal reasoning and expression processing. It covers topics such as access control policies, symbolic knowledge extraction, automated protocol analysis, and quantitative constraint solving, bridging symbolic and statistical approaches.

program_highlights.title: Specification and Analysis of Access Control, Obligation and Privacy Policies via the Category-Based MetaModel
Symbolic Knowledge Extraction and Injection: Theory and Methods
Integration of Regular Languages in Deep Learning for Sequential Domains
Automated Reasoning in Maude for Protocol Analysis
Symbolic techniques for solving quantitative constraints
Runtime Verification as contiguous formula progression and SMT solving

topics_of_interest: integration of regular languages in deep learning
